page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER IN MORETON
page.content: The{police}in Moreton use 2 Ford Escort cars and 2 bicycles.The cars are{equipped}with waiting signs, Accident signs, First Aid kit, Radio and a tape measure. The Policeman uses a truncheon ( kept in a long pocket down his trouser leg),a walkie-talkie radio, a whistle and a note book. The police station is situated in the High Street and it has one cell. It is not operated all the time, but it has an answering machine. One of their busiest days of the year is when Glos. Cricket Club play in Moreton and up to 4000 people come and watch, but some try to get in free.Another busy day is the day of the Show when crowds up to 20000 can cause traffic{problems. Market Day is also a busy time for them. Recently a Hippie convoy came through on their way to Stonehenge and caused an accident on the bridge.
